body:
I'm back and I have a lot of explaining to do.

First things first, I used to be Minecraft_Zach. I changed it because I made that name when I was 9 and it felt unoriginal and a bit immature. I really haven't been on for about 9 months. About a year ago all I can remember was getting on all day after school skyping my friends and playing Nebula. Then it just... stopped. Everyone just stopped playing MC, then got really into console gaming and dragged me into it. So, now we play Destiny pretty much everyday and I miss Avicus.

Simply put, I miss this awesome community and want to be a regular again. So... What did I miss in 9 months?
body_tagged:

title: I'm back in action!

replies.body:
Hey, welcome back!

To sum it all up, in the past nine months we had:
- Three batches of new staff
- Three new batches of senior mods
- Four new directors/admins
- Avicore Update
- November Anniversary Update 

Can't think of any more atm so hopefully someone can complete my list.

Edit: nvm, Avicore update was probably when you were still here.

replies.body:
There is going to be an update in(probably) April.
it has SG/CTW/Scrim servers/new website

make sure to continue your fanfic about nebula ;)
